# Load Data
```{r}
se <- readRDS("../../data/SE.dea.Gene.salmon.raw.rds")
```

```{r}
se$cond_name2 <- se$cond_name
se$cond_name2 <- gsub("20pmol","10nM",se$cond_name2)
se$cond_name2 <- gsub("40pmol","20nM",se$cond_name2)
se$cond_name2 <- factor(se$cond_name2,levels = c("NegCtrl","miR_10nM","miR_20nM"))
```


# Violine Figures:
```{r}
# example to get genes:
g1 <- row.names(se)[rowData(se)$gene_name %in% c("EIF4G2")]

png("../Figure_Output/Single_Genes/Eif4g2.png", width=10, height=6, units="in", res=300)
ggplot(meltSE(se, g1, assayName = "logcpm"), aes(condition, logcpm)) + geom_violin() + geom_point(aes(color = experiment)) +  facet_wrap(~feature, scale="free") + theme_classic()
dev.off()
```






## PCA
```{r}
col_vec <- c(pal_uchicago("default")(9)[1],pal_uchicago("default")(9)[3],pal_uchicago("default")(9)[5])


#assay
x <- assays(se)$corrected

#preparation
x <- t(x[which(!(apply(x, 1, var) == 0)), ])
pca <- prcomp(x)

#annotation
samples_data = as.data.frame(colData(se))
annotation_columns = colnames(colData(se))

samples_data <- samples_data[row.names(pca$x), ]
samples_data$names <- row.names(samples_data)
labs <- annotation_columns
labs[which(labs == "names")] <- ""
text <- apply(samples_data[, annotation_columns, drop = F], 
                  1, labs = labs, FUN = function(x, labs) {
                    paste(paste(labs, x), collapse = "\n")
                  })

#annotation
colorBy = "cond_name2"
shapeBy = "experiment"

cb <- samples_data[, colorBy]
    if (!is.numeric(cb)) 
      cb <- as.character(cb)

sb <- samples_data[, shapeBy]
      if (!is.numeric(cb)) 
        cb <- as.factor(as.character(cb))


#plot components
xlab <- paste("PC ", "1", " (", round(pca$sdev[1]/sum(pca$sdev) *
                                                       100, 0), "%)", sep = "")
ylab <- paste("PC ", "2", " (", round(pca$sdev[2]/sum(pca$sdev) *
                                                       100, 0), "%)", sep = "")

df <- data.frame(x = pca$x[,1],y = pca$x[,2])

p1 <- ggplot(df, aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_hline(yintercept=0, linewidth = 0.25) +
  geom_vline(xintercept=0, linewidth = 0.25) +
  geom_point(aes(color = cb, shape = sb),size = 3) +
  theme_classic() +
  xlab(xlab) + ylab(ylab) + 
  scale_color_manual(values = col_vec) +
  theme(text = element_text(size = 14), 
        axis.text.x = element_text(size = rel(1)),
        axis.text.y = element_text(size = rel(1))) +
  guides(color=guide_legend(title="Condition"),shape=guide_legend(title="Differentiation"))
  

ggsave("../Figure_Output/Exploratory/PCA_man.png",p1, width = 6.5,height = 4.5, bg = "white")

```
